facts: Contractor submitted bid for construction project
Contractor made calculation error, bid $50,000 too low
Owner accepted the bid before contractor noticed error
Owner had no reason to know of the error
asp_facts: contract(c1). unilateral_mistake(c1, yes). mistake_by(c1, contractor). other_party_knew(c1, no). unconscionable_result(c1, no). mistake_material(c1, yes). bid_amount(c1, calculation_error). enforcement_unconscionable(c1, no).
question: Can contractor avoid the contract?
rationale: Generally, unilateral mistake does not make a contract voidable unless the other party knew or should have known of the mistake. The owner had no reason to know of contractor's calculation error, so the contract is binding.
